website_summaries.verdict: Get gorgeous with this 2-piece set, including a heated lash curler and a pair of LED-lit tweezers.
pros: Heated comb gently shapes lashes into a curl
Comb separates lashes for easy use
Indicator light turns red when curler is ready to use
Comes with precision brow tweezers outfitted with an LED detail light
cons: Cannot be used with eyelash extensions
Takes a long time to heat up

customer_reviews.title: Not a pinchy eyelash curler! Yaaaay!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to expect! This works! Just a few seconds of running the cutler up and they ur lashes! I have sensitive eyes... and skin and didn’t want to wear mascara, anymore. I still have to put a thin coat of mascara because my lashes are too light (and tinting didn’t work)... but, so much better. I don’t like the traditional eyelash curlers... too Pinchy! The only downside...been a couple months and had to replace battery already.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Uses too many batteries
customer_reviews.text: I really like the results this eyelash curler gave me but I’m having to replace the battery way too frequently even though I’m very cautious about not leaving the unit on for more than a few minutes. Batteries are not inexpensive and it’s so wasteful to keep replacing them so frequently. I’m going to get a rechargeable heated eyelash curler so I’m not wasting money on batteries and adding to landfills.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't curl my lashes as well as a standard eyelash curler.
customer_reviews.text: If I heat my lashes up with this, they curl easier with the standard curler, but my idea was that I wouldn't have to use that anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Cutler doesn’t work at all!
customer_reviews.text: Curler didn’t work at all for me, sat for about 10 minutes on each side trying to get them to life and curl and nothing happened. A bit disappointed but at least I have a decent pair of tweezers now.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Halsted

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: the tweezers are great but the eyelash warmer is not it really doesn't curl your lashes takes a while to heat up and the batteries run out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: I really love the tweezers that come with this set. I find myself reaching for these tweezers over the other one that I have. The light works great for me and is what makes me love the tweezers so much. As far as the eyelash curler, I think its ok. The curler does get very hot quickly. I just didn't see really great or better results than a regular eyelash curler. I also think the regular eyelash curler is a bit faster as I hold the heated curler longer and I do a second pass.
customer_reviews.author: P.Bergbauer

customer_reviews.title: Heat element did not work
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in this heated eyelash curler. The unit I received must be a bad one. It did not heat up despite changing batteries. The lighted tweezers work very well and are easy to use even for the smallest of hairs. I’ve been using the tweezers exclusively since receiving them.
customer_reviews.author: Prism

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I used this on facial hair, it works great. Remington is a brand I trust. The battery gets low but you just have to change it out.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Sage

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t really do anything for me... it’s good material, looks nice, easy to operate, easy to store and to travel... the heat feels amazing agains my eyebrows/lid...but that’s about it. Sorry :/
customer_reviews.author: Ask_Krys

customer_reviews.title: it sucks. it does heat up
customer_reviews.text: uhhh no. it sucks. it does heat up, but after following the directions and trying really hard to make this work. it did basically nothing. while my old school lash curler gets the job done in like 10 seconds (hold it up to a lightbulb or hairdryer if you want that kind heated before use). the tweezers do tweeze...but the light is sort of oppositehelpful in actually seeing stuff because it's SO bright and blue. idk what i am going to do with this bc i am definitely not using it on my lashes...
customer_reviews.author: jennahw

customer_reviews.title: Really fun solution to eyelashes curling wrong direction
customer_reviews.text: This set was super fun. My eyelashes sometimes curl under downwards and it drives me insane, leading to more time with my eyelash curler than desired. This cool set worked great and was the solution I didn't know existed. The lit up tweezers are great also, not only for those stubborn hairs but also for getting splinters out of my son's feet. They are sharp and precise, unlike so many drugstore brands.
customer_reviews.author: Gen of North Coast Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a Gimmick, Eats Batteries
customer_reviews.text: We didn't get much out of this, the tiny LR41 watch-type batteries don't last long and a pain to replace. The tweezer is perfectly effective without it's light, and the curler isn't completely useless, but I have to say the power isn't worth the extra price.
customer_reviews.author: rampageous_cuss

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My wife doesn't really like this; she said the light was a nice touch but actually using it leaves much to be desired. She doesn't have long lashes so it's a bit tough to use. She hasn't used this after the first two times.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Woodbridge

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: This just seemed completely pointless. It takes 5 min to heat. It took me over 5 min per eye to get any slight bend to my eyelashes. Actual curl? Not happening. The lighted tweezers are okay, but not great. In under 30 seconds I can use a traditional curler and be done. I thought this would be more gentle, but it really doesn’t work, so I guess you have to suffer for beauty if curled lashes are your thing...
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

customer_reviews.title: it takes so long to get your lashes to curl that you're better off using the usual lash curler
customer_reviews.text: The lash curler seems pointless, it takes so long to get your lashes to curl that you're better off using the usual lash curler, otherwise you'll be sitting there forever. The tweezer is an A+ tweezer though, the quality is fantastic and it's so much better with the light (imagine using this not only for your eyebrows but when you've got an awful splinter in your finger).
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this product...while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with this product. It did what it was intended to do, and it was compact. BUT, it broke after only a couple of months. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: This only receive 3 stars because I like the lighted tweezers that come with the Heated Lash ...
customer_reviews.text: This only receive 3 stars because I like the lighted tweezers that come with the Heated Lash Curler. As for the curler, it heats up quickly but doesn't curl my lashes at all. The concept seems great, but it just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: RNS

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this. I tried it about four times. Maybe my eyes are too indented and my lashes not as long as most others.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V. Galasso

product_meta.title: Remington Reveal Lash & Brow Kit, Heated Eyelash Curler and Precision Tweezers with LED light (EC300B)
product_meta.description: Lashes and brows are under control with this all-in-one kit! You can create a natural-looking, long-lasting curl in seconds with the heated eyelash curler! The comb separates lashes while the heat gently shapes them into curls—with no pinching or squeezing! For shaping and defining brows, the lighted tweezers illuminate every last detail so you won’t miss a spot. Batteries included.
feature_bullets: Heated Curler - No pinching or squeezing! The heated comb gently shapes lashes into a long-lasting, gorgeous curl.

Precision Brow Tweezers with Detail Light - The easy-grip tweezers are perfect for shaping and defining your brows, while the tweezers’ detail light illuminates your brow area to reveal even the finest hairs.
Temperature Indicator - The indicator light turns red when the curler is heated and ready to use.
Protective Cap - The slide-on cap protects the curler head in storage and during travel.
Batteries Included - Batteries included for the curler and the tweezers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
